entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having just experienced an exemplary Care of Magical Creatures lesson and being thoroughly annoyed about it. He is also the one who fought Voldemort and escaped from him.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as passing by Harry with a bright greeting.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is described as emerging from the greenhouse, wearing earth on her nose and her hair tied in a knot. She has prominent eyes that seem to bulge excitedly when she sees Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named and is believed by Luna to be back.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as giggling along with Lavender at Luna's earrings.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as giggling along with Parvati at Luna's earrings.

relationships.description: Luna believes that Harry fought Voldemort and escaped from him.
Parvati is giggling along with Lavender at Luna's earrings.
